data.name: s1
data.value: (i) Consists of two to any number of rak’ahs. The best time to perform this salah is during the last third part of the night, and to perform the Salah of Witr afterwards.

data.name: s10
data.value: (ii) The niyyah for the Salah of Tahajjud is as follows:

data.name: s11
data.value: Bismilla hirahma nirrahim Nawaitu usalli rak'ataini sunnata salatit-tahajjud lillahi ta-ala {In the Name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Beneficent. I intend to pray (the) two cycles (of) the supererogatory prayer of Tahajjud for the sake of Allah, the Most High.}

data.name: s12
data.value: (iii) Recite in each rak’ah the Fatihah and any Surah or verses from the Qur’an.

data.name: s14
data.value: Allahumma lakal-hamdu, anta qaiyyumus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal-hamdu anta malikus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal-hamdu anta nurus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal hamdu antal-haq, wa wa'duka haq, wa li-qa-uka haq, wa qauluka haq, wal-jannatu haq, wan-naru haq, wan-nabiyyuna haq, wa Muhammad, sallallahu alaihi wa sallama haq, was-sa’atu haq. Allahumma laka aslamtu, wa bika amantu, wa alaika tawakkaltu, wa ilaika anabtu, wa bika khasamtu, wa ilaika hakamtu. Faghfirli ma qaddamtu wa ma akh-khartu, wa ma asrartu, wa ma a'lantu, wa ma anta a'lamu bihi minni. Antal-muqaddimu wa antal-mu-akh-khir. Lailaha- illa anta, wa la haula wa la quwwata illa billah.

data.name: s15
data.value: {In the Name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Beneficent. O Allah! All praise belongs to Thee. Thou art the Sustainer of the heavens and of the earth and whatever is therein. All praise belongs to Thee. Thou art the Ruler of the heavens and of the earth and whatever is therein. All praise belongs to Thee. Thou art the Light of the heavens and of the earth and whatever is therein. All praise belongs to Thee. Thou art the Truth, Thy promise is the truth, the meeting with Thee is the truth, Thy words are the truth, the Jannah is the truth, the Fire is the truth, the Prophets are the truth, Muhammad (may the peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) is the truth, the Hour is the truth. O Allah! To Thee do I submit, in Thee do I believe, on Thee do I depend, to Thee is my return, with Thee do I defeat my opponent in argument, to Thee do I turn for judgement. Forgive me for what I have done in the past and what I will commit in the future, what I conceal and what I reveal; and all this Thou knowest better than me. Thou art the One Who causes advancement and the One Who causes delay. There is no god other than Thee. And there is no power and strength other than with Allah.}

data.name: s2
data.value: (ii) Prior to the niyyah, say each of the following 10 times:

data.name: s4
data.value: Alhamdu lillah {All praise is due to Allah.}

data.name: s5
data.value: Subhanallahi wa bihamdih {Free of all imperfection is Allah, and to Him is all praise.}

data.name: s6
data.value: Subhanal quddus {Free of all imperfection is the Most Holy.}

data.name: s8
data.value: La ilaha illallah {There is no god other than Allah.}

data.name: s9
data.value: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika min diqid dunya wa diqi yaumil qiyamati {O Allah! I seek Thy protection from the constraint of this world and the constraint of the Hereafter.}
